songs.title: Christmas Mashup in the Christmas Live Lounge
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Christmas time don't let the bells end
Christmas time just let them ring please

[Verse 1]
Don't you know we've come too far now
Just to go and try to throw it all away
Thought I heard you say you love me
That your love was gonna be here to stay

[Pre-Chorus]
Cause last Christmas
I was driving home for Christmas
And all I want for Christmas is to

[Chorus]
Fall on your knees
Oh hear the angel voices
Oh night, divine
Oh night, that leads to morn, leads to morn

[Verse 2]
Baby, if you've got to go away
Don't think I can take the pain
Won't you stay another day?
Oh, don't leave me alone like this
Don't you say it's the final kiss
Oh, won't you stay another day?

[Pre-Chorus]
Cause last Christmas
I was driving home for Christmas
And all I want for Christmas is to

[Chorus]
Fall on your knees
Oh hear the angel voices
Oh night, divine
Oh night, that leads to morn, leads to morn

[Bridge]
Hankey, the Christmas Poo
He loves me and I love you
Therefore, vicariously, he loves you too
We can make a Mr. Hanky too

[Chorus]
Won't you fall on your knees?
Oh hear the angel voices
Oh night, divine
Oh night that leads to morn, leads to morn

[Outro]
Baby, if you've got to go away
Don't think I can take the pain
Won't you stay another day?
Oh, don't leave me alone like this
Don't you say it's the final kiss
Oh, won't you stay another day?
